definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
even an honest and upright official will have difficulty resolving a family dispute (proverb)
pinyin: qing1 guan1 nan2 duan4 jia1 wu4 shi4

sentences.english: When I was doing the housework, my husband telephoned me from the office.
sentences.chinese: 当我正在干家务时，我丈夫从办公室打电话给我。

sentences.english: Will men participate more in household duties?
sentences.chinese: 男性会更多地参与家务劳动吗？

sentences.english: Now Charlie knows that all BINGO Kids have to do chores.
sentences.chinese: 现在查理知道了，所有的宾果孩子们都要做家务。

sentences.english: However, some help with chores and contributions to shared food are expected.
sentences.chinese: 然而，客人可以帮忙做些家务活，一起分享食物。

sentences.english: I didn’t do anything, even housework.
sentences.chinese: 我什么都没做，甚至家务活都没做。

sentences.english: Each time a child follows through with a task, he receives a sticker.
sentences.chinese: 每次孩子按照指示做完家务，他都会得到一个贴纸。

sentences.english: And while we’re talking about chores, the light in the basement burned out.
sentences.chinese: 既然在谈家务事，地下室的灯泡烧坏了。

sentences.english: Housework done properly can kill you.
sentences.chinese: 适当地干家务活会杀了你。

sentences.english: There’s still nothing much to do here, just watch TV or help with chores.
sentences.chinese: 在这里仍然无事可做，除了看电视和帮忙做家务。

sentences.english: Happy man still should provide household job less as far as possible.
sentences.chinese: 快乐的丈夫还应该尽量少管家务事。

sentences.english: Your mother prefers to do her own housekeeping -- even if it is a little slapdash.
sentences.chinese: 即便有点精心马虎了，你母亲还是更喜欢自己做家务。

sentences.english: We spent the weekend pottering around the house.
sentences.chinese: 我们周末做一些琐碎的家务事。

sentences.english: She looketh well to the ways of her household, and eateth not the bread of idleness.
sentences.chinese: 他观察家务，并不吃闲饭。

sentences.english: At home, she ofter helps mother do the housework, and she likes reading a books.
sentences.chinese: 在家里，她经常帮助妈妈做家务，读一些她喜欢的书。

sentences.english: Her hands were roughened by housework.
sentences.chinese: 她的手由于家务劳动而变得粗糙。

definition: to go to the kitchen (to prepare a meal)/to cook
to pick the edible part of vegetables
variant of 賢慧|贤慧[xian2 hui4]
to assist one's husband and educate the children (idiom)/the traditional roles of a good wife
